name: Bobo Bounco: Circus Dreams
description:
My Global Game Jam 2019 entry! "What home means to you" was the theme, and what's the home of a clown? A circus! Make a clown and design your own circus in a lighthearted sandbox experience.

I made this over the weekend while at the Oslo event together with a classmate. We originally made a game called Bobo Bounco during our first semester of Game Design studies, and this is a spinoff from that. She is the loremaster and the lead designer for our clown-filled universe, while I do the programming. All the art is from assets (though great care is taken to make Aunt Kissy's environments really pop).

There are no goals beyond building, but I'd love to see screenshots of what you've made, so feel free to link them in the comments!

Credits for the art assets used can be found below.

Link to the Global Game Jam entry: https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/bobo-bounco-circus-dreams
